tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My friend referred us to Rajashri Grandhim hospital. I told my wife lets go and check out then decide. I remember the day we went we were welcomed with a smile in the face of the staff there. In fact, those smiling faces of staff remain the same even today when we visit the hospital and also it is one of the few hospitals where I have seen they check patient 1st before asking you to pay. These 1st-time experiences created a positive vibe and we decided we will consult with Dr. Shilpa for our pregnancy. During the 3rd month of pregnancy, my wife developed some complications and we rushed to the hospital. Dr. Shilpa immediately checked and admitted her for observation. From that time, it was always tense moments for us but Dr.Shilpa made sure that we are aware of the challenges and was reassuring that it will be okay. 

This was another pleasant surprise waiting for us on the day of delivery. Since there were complications during the pregnancy, Dr.Shilpa suggested it might be C-Section but on the day of delivery, she said your baby is fine. I will do a normal delivery.

By God’s grace, we had a cute girl child thru normal delivery. we indebted to the Dr.Shilpa some much that we have named our daughter as Shilpa as one of the names.

We are consulting with Dr.Haresh for our baby. Like all new parents we also are very anxious we used to call him or visit the hospital every week with some queries. Dr.Haresh comes across a down to earth person who explains the things patiently.

I definitely recommend them to all who are looking for a caring hospital for their pregnancy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I want to share my Honest review so that many like me could be benefited, in 2018 December I just came for a scan in rajashri grandhim hospital, I didn't even know about this hospital at First, just heard it is good from the people, so went for a scan , and in second time Dr.shilpa haresh suddenly told that we can start the treatment, first I couldn't believe anyone, but later I thought to give a chance to myself believing in her, so agreed and followed her advice, for me there was a block in right fallopian tube and pcod, so  we were in lots of stress , and she really told me everything in a positive way to believe her with full of my heart, I really couldn't forget that day, and in march I successfully conceived by iui ( intrauterine insemination) in this hospital by Dr. Shilpa haresh, we were really happy that we are going to be parents soon, but in June she found that my cervix is opened that baby may come out in early that is the starting of second trimester, we all were shocked, but she immediately took action of laparoscopy surgery to save the baby in every possibility, after the successful surgery I was adviced to take full bed rest and admitted in rajashri grandhim hospital for three months until my 36 weeks completes, first I was worried to stay, but now I really miss all of them because everyone there took care of me really well, even the cleaning persons was very caring to me, I felt like a home there, whenever I called for help sisters came immediately even for minor doubts, I couldn't mention the staff members or the person's name because each and everyone was taking care of me really, and duty doctors also took real care , duty doctors Dr.chaitra and Dr.ashwini was really helpful in person and was very positive with me,  so I thank you all the staff members with bottom of my heart, with their help I'm now blessed with a boy baby, without them I couldn't imagine . even the security persons were helpful, I thank you all so much for your timely help. Finally in the day of delivery all the doctors successfully gave me my little one in my hands, Dr. Haresh Babu really took care after the moment my baby born immediately, each and every person was in full of energy to care me, I really really thank you all so much doctors, sisters , cleaning persons, security everyone in this Hospital, I really don't know how to thank you , I'm always grateful to doctor shilpa haresh, very positive doctor, everytime whenever I ask questions or something in fear she just comforts me nothing to worry in a positive way, that response was really thoughtful and I was gifted to have such a great doctor in my life, really thank you Dr.shilpa mam, even when am writing this review I couldn't control my tears , she is really a god to me,  once again I thank you everyone for giving me such a comfortable great days to overcome all the obstacles with my baby, we ( my family )all are really grateful to you doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited the hospital for pregnancy related issues. Dr. Shilpa Harish was so patient and cooperative enough us to explain our condition and was with us throughout our memorable pregnancy journey. I got conceived in the month of April via IVF with the help of doctors and gods grace. But my pregnancy journey was not so smooth. Had complications of spoting in the initial days, experienced heavy bleeding in the 4th month due to low placental line, my cervix was opened up at 28th weeks and lastly had to deliver at 36 weeks due to BP fluctuations. In this tough journey Dr. Shilpa was always with us in reach everytime. She has responded to all our messages and during my 4th month bleeding she was present in the hospital at midnight before we reach there to assist us. Also, the cervix operation was carefully done and after which she was so kind enough to send her staff nurse for every 15 days to our house to provide me injection and vitals check. Here, I would like to mention the kind staff nurse as well as housekeeping staff who has helped me in this journey. Special thanks to Dr. Chitra, Shilpa sister, Maheshwari sister, Beti sister and Pilamma aunty. Just want to say that we were in right hands. And love and respect to all of them in hospital from us and our baby Ishaanvi.😘

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: She was a not a polite one. She didn’t even ask me any symptom's or issues directly told me go for pregnancy test. *** ***** ** *** ********* ***** ** *********** ****** *** **** **** * *** ** ******** * ** ****** *  ** *************** He wasn’t humble at all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnant,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy Scan,
review: Dr. Shilpa Haresh is very very patient friendly who is available at Rajashri Grandhims Hospital, Bamgalore. I consultated with doctor from pre pregnancy confirmation to post meternatity. During pre-pregnancy time, she treated very well to get pregnency confirmation. We are very lucky meet doctor like this. She always understand our problem then explain very nicely. She was available 24 hours to the patient through her mobile. We can reach doctor any time in day for throughout the year inclufing festivals and lockdowns. She motivated me through the pregnency time for healthy presgnency. This hospital has many skilled and experienced nurses and junior doctors to take care of baby and mother. We need only cost there doctor will take care the rest of everthing. We want to thank also her supporting doctor (Dr. Chaitra) for her guidance during admission at hospital.  Post maternity Dr. Haresh babu, pediatrician and neonatologist take care of baby's helath post deliver. Once we reach to hospital A to Z take care by Dr. Shilpa Haresh. Last but not least it's multi speciality Hospital. All the doctors will be available for any problem and side effects. My rating 5 out of 5. Many many thanks Dr. Shilpa Haresh ant all the very best. *** *** *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Its true…Happiness Begins at RajaShri Grandhim Hospital

I wondered whatever happened in this situation but blessed to have great doctors like Dr. Shilpa and Dr. Haresh, My wife has spotted bleeding at 14 weeks, by the time we have reached hospital water breaks, after ultrasound, Dr Shilpa said that the baby is fine though water was not completely drained; it was very critical situation for us. Immediately they have started treatment to hold water leakage, infection. She was under observation for 16 days, in course of water break, placenta was also started separating, every scan was a big hurdle for us, It was challenging for Dr Shilpa too. My wife was put on complete bed rest from then, lost amniotic fluid can’t be reproduced overnight, but their expertise in the field of gynecology, suggested medication along with diet plan helped us in early recovery, moving on our daily scans turned into weekly and monthly scans, She explains every part of treatment which gives confidence to the patient and hope to the family, they have dedicated staff, they have monitored hourly round the clock. They are very helpful and provide good ambiance to the patients. Hospital has well equipped and maintained with good lab. Your half pain will go when you talk to Dr Shilpa and Dr haresh Babu. Hospitals staff extended their support to our home. During 33.4 weeks my wife got pain in her abdomen, and they have done C section, we are blessed with a baby girl at 33.4 weeks. Since it was pre-term baby, she was in Rainbow NICU for 4 days and then moved to Grandhim Hospital after Dr Haresh babu assurance, since then Dr Haresh babu took personal care, and we are continuing our regular vaccination at RajaShri Grandhim Hospital. Now our baby is 3+ months old. Believe in God, never lose your confidence and have faith in your doctors.

-- 
Regards
Sagar Kortalwar

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have been under the guidance and support under Dr. Shilpa Hareesh for Maternity and I must say, the best hospital and support services i have ever come across.
The doctor, entire staff, nurses,and even medical store associates are truly dedicated and generous towards each one during every single visit.
One of the most to be recommended hospitals according to my opinion.
Now I am gratefully blessed and completed a successful delivery of my little one.
Once again thanks to Dr. Shilpa for her great expertise and the entire Rajashri Grandhim hospital for their diligence at work.
Me and my husband are truly grateful

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I would like to thank Dr. Shilpa for the wonderful pregnancy experience that I could have because of her...unlike my first delivery Dr.  made sure that my second delivery is a smooth experience...I could tell that she guided us beautifully throughout pregnancy and was available within minutes for my delivery...n the post care was also awesome with all the cooperative staff beside. Hospital is well maintained and staff us friendly and cooperative and understanding... Even Dr. Haresh was wonderful with my newborn...explaining all caring tips for him.I wud recommend this hospital to my friends and family for gynaecologist and paediatric care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I can say with confidence that visiting Dr Shilpa and Dr Haresh for our first pregnancy was one odd the best decisions we have taken. There were moments when my wife wanted to go for a c section because of the pain,but the nurses and the doctor were always discouraging it and even with few minor complications, (which would easily be a reason for any other g hospitals to do a c section d fill their pockets) , the doctors were successfully able to perform a natural delivery for my wife. It well not be incorrect to state that we will be forever grateful  to them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),
review: Hi.. My first pregnancy I delivered in May 2020 which was less than 8 months. A sudden slight discomfort I felt & called Dr. Shilpa (due to Pandemic mostly consulted on phone before stepping out).  I visited for a check-up & found that I would be delivering the baby soon. Dr.Shilpa took the best care required at that moment & was very confident.  A normal delivery & a healthy baby girl I delivered though premature no NICU was required. *** ** *** **** ***** * **** *********** *** would highly recommend Dr. Shilpa Haresh.  Cheers 2020 :-)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctors and staffs are really good and approachable. 
I was consulting Dr. Shilpa Hareesh. 
She is such a nice and knowledgeable doctor, rare to find these kind of doctors in today's world. 
During my labor pain, she didn't even go to her home, she stayed back in the hospital for the whole night. She takes care of her patients so well.. 
Dr. Hareesh is my daughter's pediatric. He is also so approachable and so nice. He is taking care of her right from her birth.
Definitely special thanks to Sister Maria, Sister Betty and Sister Divya who were really professional and caring. They are well aware of how to take care of the new borns and pregnant ladies.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I will be happy to strongly recommend to Dr. Shipla Haresh & Dr. Haresh Babu.**** **** **** **** * ***** ****** ********** ** ********* ******.
She is very co-operative with all patients and their family members.
* **** ****** *** ********** **** **** *** ********* ** * ******.
Thank you so much respected Dr. Shilpa Madam for the difference you make in our lives.
Your kindness, sincere caring, and concern make everything better and are a great encouragement.

Thank you so very much for taking care of me and being so skilled at what you do for me. 
Every day of my life will be better because of you.

You are truly a woman of honor and word.
 I will always pray to God for your betterment.

tags: None
review:
Blessed to have great doctor like Dr.shilpa mam and Dr.Haresh sir. Their was lot of problems in my pregnancy because of some false report it was proven like my baby has a problem with down syndrome .I went through so many hospatils for my baby problem  but their was no clear result found ..few doctors suggested to abort when I was in 5 month of pregnancy ..And I finally consulted Dr.shilpa mam with all my reports .After checking she gave a postive comment and told me to continue my pregnancy.Her positivity gave me good vibes. And now I'm happily delivered baby boy on May 29th 2018 at Rajshri Grandhim Hospital.

My baby is super fine now he is 3 months old and we are continuing our regular vaccination at same hospital. They have good staff very talented and well trained ..Happy with doctors , staff, maintenance overall 10/10 ranking.

tags: None
review: The doctor greeted us with a pleasant smile and was very patient in explaining us every process that we need to follow.  All in all it was a good choice.

tags: None
review: The doctor was incredibly helpful but the staff wasn't. I had an appointment for 11 and even though i reached the clinic at 10:30 with no one else waiting, I couldn't see the doctor until 12:30.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The abysmal experience of my life. The doctor didn't even ask about the issue and directly asked to undergo tests that had nothing to do with my issues **** ** **** ************ ******** ****** t** ** ****** ****** ** ** ********* **** Also the staff was very rude and unhelpful throughout the process. I paid my fees just so that I can leave the premises and go to some other doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Bad experience. No patience to listen to patients problem. She was telling something and we wanted something, ** ***** **** **** ***** ** *****.Dr should have patience first.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was very good experience with grandhim hospital. I have been visiting Dr Haresh babu from last 10 years. This was the first time we met Dr Shilpa madam for my wife pregnancy care. We had great experience during our visit from last 9-10 months. Under her supervision, my wife delivered baby boy. We also want to say that entire staff is very cooperative and kind. Thanks a lot !!!

 Statisfactory with the treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was great experience consulting Dr. Shilpa mam. Though it was lockdown period, she took complete care of my wife pregnancy and so friendly in nature. Finally we got delivered baby girl and hospital facilities were clean and neat. The Staff were polite and friendly throughout our consultation. Overall it’s a nice experience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: in the month of June my wife delivered our first baby. me (Aniket) and my wife (Pooja) feel very lucky to come in contact with Dr Shilpa. She has grt patience and understanding of psychology. She answered every call and msg during 9months. her grt consultation helped my wife to deliver baby naturally. we NVR felt that we are being charged more. Her hospital us also very good. staff members give family like treatment. words are not enough in describing the very good association with Dr Shilpa. I strongly recommend the great lady to every couple.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is patient and gives you the right treatment and friendly.  But we need to wait for long for online consultation. Connecting with the doctor was delayed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very satisfied with the delivery, friendlyness of the doctor to explain each and everything clearly . Satisfied with the guidelines and friendlyness of the nurses and staff during the whole procedure of pregnancy and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Wow experience over all with Dr Shilpa haresh and Dr haresh babu specially. We suggest rajashri hospital

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctor was very busy but still gave good counselling
Was very responsive and eager to understand the issue and investigate instead of rushing to a conclusion
She immediately did some scans and gave advice

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I was very well taken care of at Rajashri Grandhim Speciality Hospital . "Everyone was very nice, and it is nice to be treated well since u r the patient in need of help. Caring, smiling and laughing is good atmosphere for patients .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ****** ****** ** * **** ****** she talk with nicely hospital staff is very good respect good hospital **** ******

tags: None
review: Doctor was kind enough to clearly explain what the issue was and what could be done.She listened to the problems faced very patiently.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor explains the issue very briefly and educate the patient properly. Appointment are divided so well that hospital workers make sure we only wait for 10min to maximum 30min, I am Quit impressed with that coz pregnant lady cannot sit and wait for hours when they have delicate pregnancy. The money they charge is also worthy enough. They also offer Yoga for pregnancy by a qualified therapist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hi friends ,I would like share my second delivery experience which is normal as my first delivery is also normal...both doctor Shilpa haresh and haresh babu are expert and so friendly...they treat me so patiently...also we find very caring and friendly staff and nurses here....people can easily trust them user friendly and pocket friendly...

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr .Shilpa Haresh and Haresh Babu saved us from pre mature delivery of our baby otherwise it would be very difficult for our baby to survive also she saved us from c section delivery so I am very grateful to both the doctors and recommend Dr. Shilpa Haresh and Dr. Haresh Babu for gynecology **** ******
